alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 7:47AM MDT until June 26 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Moderate Flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM MDT Thursday was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.9 feet on 07/20/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM MDT.
